alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 01 at 1:37PM AKST until February 03 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 50 below expected. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. * WHERE...Upper Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Now to noon Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds gusting to 20 mph will continue in the Upper Yukon Valley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
